intro.headline: An Independent Brokerage Built on Expertise
intro.body: Pinnacle Realty Group was founded 12 years ago with a simple belief: that clients deserve better than a franchise template and a rotating door of agents. We built a team of dedicated specialists — people who live in Westchester, know every street, and treat every transaction with the attention it deserves.
